snippet: After a major renovation, fueled in part by $41 million in New York City funds, BRIC Arts will reopen an expanded facility within the former Strand Theater on Fulton Street in Brooklyn.
abstract: After a major renovation, fueled in part by $41 million in New York City funds, BRIC Arts will reopen an expanded facility within the former Strand Theater on Fulton Street in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Brooklyn Arts Group to Reopen in the Former Strand Theater
headline.print_headline: BRIC to Reopen In Renovated Space
